metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7821 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
OpenStack Neutron before 2014.1.4 and 2014.2.x before 2014.2.1 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted dns_nameservers value in the DNS configuration.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7821` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

neutron-common - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-dhcp-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-l3-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-lbaas-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-metadata-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-metering-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-bigswitch - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-bigswitch-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-brocade - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-cisco - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-hyperv - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ibm - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ibm-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-linuxbridge - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-linuxbridge-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-metaplugin - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-metering-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-midonet - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ml2 - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-mlnx - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-mlnx-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-nec - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-nec-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-nicira - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-oneconvergence - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-oneconvergence-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-openflow-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-openvswitch - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-openvswitch-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-plumgrid - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ryu - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-ryu-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-vmware - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-plugin-vpn-agent - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
neutron-server - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1

python-neutron - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Henry Yamauchi, Charles Neill and Michael Xin

notes.Note: mdeslaur> perhaps the following commit should also be used: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/neutron/commit/?h=stable/icehouse&id=d39349cf47dfe9ac3f52089402d69cd1be8b013b

criterions.comment: neutron package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1').
